item.title: Using Multiple Themes With Hugo
item.description: I like the simplicity of the first theme I chose for this site, hugo-sustain. After setting it up, however, I realized that the “resume” section links to a separate site, and actually uses a different theme (hugo-vitae). I wanted to be able to use two hugo themes on the same site, and spent a little time investigating how to do that. There’s essentially two options (as with anything in programming, there’s tradeoffs in where you put the complexity):
